wrath.client.input

Class InputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • wrath.client.input.InputManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable

    public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Closeable
    Class to manage all input operations. Used to organize code and clean up the Game class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InputManager.KeyData
      Keeps track of keys.

    • Method Detail

      • addSavedFunction

        public static void addSavedFunction(java.lang.String id,
                                    java.lang.Runnable function)
        Adds a listener to a specified String ID to be added later to a Keyboard or mouse function. Name is NOT case sensitive!
        Parameters:
        id - The String ID of the saved function.
        function - The event to be saved.

      • getSavedFunction

        public static java.lang.Runnable getSavedFunction(java.lang.String functionID)
        Gets the Runnable associated with the saved function ID.
        Parameters:
        functionID - The function ID to reverse reference.
        Returns:
        Returns the Runnable event associated with the String Function ID.

      • addDefaultKeyBinding

        public void addDefaultKeyBinding(int key,
                                 java.lang.Runnable function)
        Sets default key binding.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to respond to.
        function - The Runnable event to run after specified button is affected by the specified action.

      • addDefaultKeyBinding

        public void addDefaultKeyBinding(int key,
                                 KeyAction action,
                                 java.lang.Runnable function)
        Sets default key binding.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to respond to.
        action - The KeyAction that will trigger the event.
        function - The Runnable event to run after specified button is affected by the specified action.

      • addDefaultKeyBinding

        public void addDefaultKeyBinding(int key,
                                 int keyMod,
                                 KeyAction action,
                                 java.lang.Runnable function)
        Sets default key binding.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to respond to.
        keyMod - The Key MOD_x to respond to; e.g. MOD_ALT to activate when ALT is also held down, -1 for none.
        action - The KeyAction that will trigger the event.
        function - The Runnable event to run after specified button is affected by the specified action.

      • addDefaultKeyBinding

        public void addDefaultKeyBinding(int key,
                                 java.lang.String functionID)
        Sets default key binding.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to respond to.
        functionID - The pre-assigned Function ID, as assigned by addSavedFunction(java.lang.String, java.lang.Runnable).

      • addDefaultKeyBinding

        public void addDefaultKeyBinding(int key,
                                 KeyAction action,
                                 java.lang.String functionID)
        Sets default key binding.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to respond to.
        action - The KeyAction that will trigger the event.
        functionID - The pre-assigned Function ID, as assigned by addSavedFunction(java.lang.String, java.lang.Runnable).

      • addDefaultKeyBinding

        public void addDefaultKeyBinding(int key,
                                 int keyMod,
                                 KeyAction action,
                                 java.lang.String functionID)
        Sets default key binding.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to respond to.
        keyMod - The Key MOD_x to respond to; e.g. MOD_ALT to activate when ALT is also held down, -1 for none.
        action - The KeyAction that will trigger the event.
        functionID - The pre-assigned Function ID, as assigned by addSavedFunction(java.lang.String, java.lang.Runnable).

      • bindDefaultEngineKeys

        public void bindDefaultEngineKeys()
        Binds all default engine functions to keys. For further reference, refer to DefaultKeyBindings.txt in the default package.

      • bindKey

        public void bindKey(int key,
                    int keyMod,
                    KeyAction action,
                    java.lang.String functionID)
        Binds a function to the specified key/button.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to respond to.
        keyMod - The Key MOD_x to respond to; e.g. MOD_ALT to activate when ALT is also held down, -1 for none.
        action - The KeyAction that will trigger the event.
        functionID - The pre-assigned Function ID, as assigned by addSavedFunction(java.lang.String, java.lang.Runnable).

      • bindKeysToDefaults

        public void bindKeysToDefaults()
        Binds all pre-defined default keys. Note that this DOES NOT clear all user-defined bindings, refer to unbindAllKeys().

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: Closeable
        Place anything that needs to be closed in this method.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable

      • destroyCursor

        public void destroyCursor()
        Destroys the custom cursor and all of it's data, if it exists.

        Gets the X position of the cursor.
        Returns:
        Returns the X position of the cursor.

      • getCursorY

        public double getCursorY()
        Gets the Y position of the cursor.
        Returns:
        Returns the Y position of the cursor.

      • isCursorEnabled

        public boolean isCursorEnabled()
        Returns whether or not the cursor is enabled.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the cursor is enabled, otherwise false.

      • isKeyBound

        public boolean isKeyBound(int key)
        Checks to see if a key has an action bound to it.
        Parameters:
        key - The Key to check binds.
        Returns:
        Returns true if an action is already bound to the key.

      • loadKeys

        public void loadKeys()
        Loads pre-saved keys.

      • onPersistentInput

        public void onPersistentInput()
        Used by the Game class to run tasks assigned to persistent keys. Not necessary to call.

      • openInput

        public void openInput()
        Used by the Game class to initialize all of the GLFW input callbacks.

      • saveKeys

        public void saveKeys()
        Saves key bindings (containing saved functions) to pre-configured file "KeyBindsFile".

      • setCursor

        public void setCursor(int cursormode)
        Changes the cursor from a list of standard cursors located in Key.
        Parameters:
        cursormode - The Key Cursor to switch to.

      • setCursorEnabled

        public void setCursorEnabled(boolean cursorEnabled)
        Enables or disables the cursor.
        Parameters:
        cursorEnabled - Whether the cursor should be enabled or disabled.

      • unbindAllKeys

        public void unbindAllKeys()
        Clears all defined key bindings. This DOES NOT set them to default, refer to bindKeysToDefaults().

      • unbindKey

        public void unbindKey(int key)
        Un-binds all functions bound to the specified key/button.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to un-bind all functions on.
